# donationIdentifier(_:)

**Type Method**

Delete the transcript record with the given donation identifier

## Declaration

```swift
static func donationIdentifier(_ identifier: IntentDonationIdentifier) -> IntentDonationMatchingPredicate
```

## Creating a predicate

- **entityIdentifier(_:)**: Delete all transcript records referencing the given AppEntity instance
- **intentType(_:entityIdentifier:)**: Delete all transcript records for the given AppIntent type, optionally only those referencing a given AppEntity instance identifier
